burgers.name: Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy 1/2 lb patty topped with a slice of american cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce

burgers.name: Double Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Two juicy 1/2 lb patties, topped with two slices of american cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce

burgers.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy 1/2 lb patty topped with a slice of american cheese, lettuce, tomato, two slices of succulent bacon, and our secret sauce

burgers.name: Bacon Double Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Two juicy 1/2 lb patties, topped with two slices of american cheese, lettuce, tomato,  four slices of succulent bacon, and our secret sauce

burgers.name: Southwest Burger
burgers.description: Juicy 1/2 lb patty, between two slices of toasted texas toast bread, and topped with a slice of american cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion rings, and our house BBQ sauce

sides.name: Tater Tots
sides.description: In-house tater tots, made fresh daily

sides.name: French Fries
sides.description: Fresh cut fries, cooked to perfection in piping hot peanut oil

sides.name: Onion Rings
sides.description: Hand battered onion rings, made to order

sides.name: Chili Cheese Tots
sides.description: Tater tots smothered in our specialty chili and cheese

sides.name: Chili Cheese Fries
sides.description: French Fries smothered in our specialty chili and cheese

desserts.name: M&M Shake
